reviewText: The Dvd was good but plot and story line was hard to follow, overall it was an enjoyable Donnie Yen video, I own quite of few of his movies because he is an excellent martial artist and actor
Expecting more action from Donnie Yen, but overall good movie.
It was a good story just wasn't expecting that it was a story about an up rising in China. But it was good.
Agreat dvd another good donnie yen dvd.
This is an action packed movie.

It's not IP MAN but it's a good movie Donnie Yen is not in the movie as much as you think towards the end he has a couple fight scenes and I set the audio to English 2.0 that's the only english available but it mostly is sub titled but it's actually not bad

Donnie strikes again!  He clearly demonstrates that he is a master of the historical fiction martial arts movie.  Based thinly on the visit of Dr. Sun to China in order to help organize resistance to the Ching government, Donnie weaves a multi-leveled tale of intrigue and betrayal.  For anyone interested in that period of China's history and watching Donnie's Wu Shu skills, this movie is well worth the price.
Good action movie with Donnie Yen and some character but Donnie part wasn't too great.
